1 DOGE equals 0.16 USD. The current value of 1 Dogecoin is  -3.41% against the
exchange rate to USD in the last 24 hours.​ The current Dogecoin market cap is
$23.64B. ​Create a free Kraken account to instantly convert DOGE to USD today.

## How to convert  
Dogecoin to United States Dollar

### Create your free  
Kraken account

You can trade DOGE on Kraken with as little as $10.

### Connect your  
funding method

Link your card or bank account  
after Kraken verifies your account.

### Convert  
DOGE to USD

Choose from cryptocurrencies  
to trade on Kraken.

[Trade now](https://kraken.app.link/C7jtQTPhHFb)

### DOGE to USD converter FAQ:

  1. ### What does conversion rate mean?

The Dogecoin to United States Dollar conversion rate is the amount of United
States Dollar you can receive for each unit of Dogecoin.

  2. ### What affects the Dogecoin to United States Dollar conversion rate?

The conversion rate between Dogecoin and United States Dollar may fluctuate
based on supply and demand, relative scarcity, investor sentiment, media
attention and other factors.

  3. ### How do I use this DOGE to USD converter tool?

Enter the amount of Dogecoin you wish to convert to United States Dollar into
the Dogecoin field. To convert United States Dollar to Dogecoin, input the
amount of United States Dollar in the United States Dollar field.

  4. ### How can I convert Dogecoin to United States Dollar ?

    1. Ensure Dogecoin and United States Dollar are selected in the converter tool
    2. Enter the amount of Dogecoin you want to convert into United States Dollar
    3. Click "Trade now" to sign up or sign into your Kraken account
    4. Convert Dogecoin to United States Dollar with just a few clicks

  5. ### Can I buy DOGE with USD?

Yes, this trading pair is available on Kraken.

unregulated, and you may not be protected by government compensation and/or
regulatory protection schemes. The unpredictable nature of the crypto-asset
markets can lead to loss of funds. Tax may be payable on any return and/or on
any increase in the value of your cryptoassets and you should seek independent
advice on your taxation position. Geographic restrictions may apply._

2024
